slide1.title: Welcome to Travel Budget
slide1.text: Your digital companion for stress-free vacation planning and smart budget management. Everything under control ‚Äì from first idea to final expense.

slide2.title: Plan Your Dream Trip
slide2.text: Create trips, collect destinations and hotels, save photos, and keep track of everything on the map.

slide3.title: Budget Always in Control
slide3.text: Track expenses by category, use multi-currency support with live exchange rates, and see your budget in real-time.

slide4.title: Never Forget Anything
slide4.text: Use smart packing lists, to-dos, and bucket lists with pre-made templates. Organize easily with drag & drop.

slide5.title: Optimized for You
slide5.text: Dark/Light Mode, works offline, available in German and English. Your travel data stays secure on your device.
